author: harrypuuter
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a backport of the HTXS filter to be able to reproduce STXS-filtered UL samples used in SM H->tautau analyses with Run 2 UL. The samples for the non-UL analysis were produced using CMSSW 10_2_X but this filter was not added to the 10_6_X release used for the UL production.

#### PR validation:

Basic tests have been run.

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26891
title: Backport: add HTXS Filter for Run2 UL
